channel.title: Trying to develop a method.(duel area)
channel.description: Okay, so im creating a duel arena on my server and i was wondering if anyone knew how to make it so when you clikc "Challenge" it will do the method i want it to do.I am using deltascape base. I already have it so when ur in the duel area, then it shows up as Challenge and when your not it doesnt.Thanks.

item.title: Trying to develop a method.(duel area)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

…that did not make any sense.

I take it ‘Challenge’ is a button found on the Runescape client interface? Just go to where you handle the object clicking packet (in 317 I do believe it is 132), and handle the id.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to develop a method.(duel area)

item.title: Trying to develop a method.(duel area)
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy
item.description:
@syzygy wrote:

You have to have a call for it i believe. I know there is a tut in the tut area on methods.
